data.title: Why are the mafia threatened by "wise guys"?
data.meta_description:
Answer (1 of 4): They’re not, per se.

A ‘wiseguy’ usually applies to a soldato, or ‘made man’, as do several other descriptors, though it can also be used in reference to some associates, mostly those who would be made men if only they had the ethnic eligibility.

A made man is to be respected a...
